responses: Hi there, how can I help?
To plot a graph, give a plot type followed by the X and Y columns you want to plot and upload the file containing data
I can provide you with scatterplot, boxplot or barplot
Please provide a graph type from scatterplot boxplot or barplot
Which plot sample do you want? I have boxplot, scatterplot and barplot samples
Choose between scatterplot, boxplot and barplot after typing plot keyword
Which plots do you want to retrieve? Write : retrieve all/ retrieve from MM/DD/YY to MM/DD/YY
Write retrieve followed by either all or the dates in MM/DD/YY format
